about: Dodgy C ---------- I Spend A Lot Of Time Farting Around With Music And Like To Share What I Can, If Anybody Wants Bits And Pieces Of The Loops I Do (i.e. Just The Drum Track.), Email Me At dodgyc@live.co.uk And I'll See What I Can Do. Also I Am Always Interested To See Where My Samples Are Used So And Email Link For That Would Be Nice!!!
